articles.title: American Coco Gauff ousted in the opening round at Wimbledon in a shocking upset - CNN
articles.description: No. 2 seed Coco Gauff was shockingly upset at the 2025 Wimbledon Championships on Tuesday as Ukrainian Dayana Yastremska defeated the Roland Garros champion 7-6(3), 6-1.
articles.content:
No. 2 seed Coco Gauff was shockingly upset at the 2025 Wimbledon Championships on Tuesday as Ukrainian Dayana Yastremska defeated the Roland Garros champion 7-6(3), 6-1.

articles.title: Scooter Braun Steps Down as CEO of HYBE America - Variety
articles.description: Scooter Braun will step down from his role as CEO of HYBE America and will move into a consulting role.
articles.content:
Scooter Braun will step down from his role as CEO of HYBE America and move into a consulting role, the company announced Tuesday.
